We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects. His role has often been described as providing "adult supervision" at a company whose young co-founders like to do things in unconventional ways. Eric Schmidt has a great track record and has really steered Google to great success, said Gartner analyst Ray Valdes. New York Post reported. Ken Auletta , author of "Googled: The End of the World as We Know It," told Bloomberg TV that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the Obama administration. Maybe he'll find some kind of astonishing offer, either at a startup or at a foundation or from a political unit, but today, he's hanging on to the right to define his job as he sees fit while continuing to make a pile of money, said Whit Andrews, a Shrewsbury, Mass.-based analyst at Gartner Google Inc.
